DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to determine if macular edema is associated with less visual function and quality of live in patients with intermediate uveitis
DOC.brief_title: Quality of Life in Patients With Intermediate Uveitis
DOC.criteria: Pars planitis Patients with any other diseases Patients under age 18
DOC.keyword: Quality of life in patients with macular edema compared to patients without macular edema.
